author: Raul Villaseca
description:
You can use a system of horizontal flow packaging or just a plastic sleeve with a sealing system.
This system isolates two compartments, preventing unwanted flow between both entering and leaving only what is inside the plastic package.
summary: In areas of Ebola patients, should enter (food, medicine, clothing) and must leave (blood samples for laboratory, deceased patients and contaminated clothing).We propose the use of gates that have a plastic sleeve retracted, which allows encapsulating the inputs and outputs.
title: sleeve Input and Output
